Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: absarking

} } } Length:: 7:32 Minshis a great tablet for any who wants a great tablet that handles tasks like reading emails, surfing web, play games, and watch HD videos well. I think this is a great gift for anyone. I many use it for youtube and xbmc. The keyboard makes everything much faster. It also is nice stand.

Reviews.Title: A great little tablet.
Reviews.Author: Thomas Grillo "Thomas Grillo"
Reviews.Content: I have the white version of this tablet. It works quite nicely. I like the front & rear cameras. Comes in handy with Skype calls. :)The tablet seems to work fine with Minecraft, and other games. Video is good for watching your own vids, or youtube, ect.I also like the keyboard which uses USB, so no worrying about mating protocols.I get about 2 hours of use from a full charge when on fast mode, and a good bit more on normal.I used one of these for a theremin gig I did in New York recently. I had it attached to my theremin so I could call up the music accompaniment tracks I needed. She really worked a treat for the gig. Later, when I got back to the hotel after the gig, I played a little minecraft. :)

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: Sherri
Reviews.Content: Item was shipped in a timely manner especially with the Christmas season.This tablet is not bad w/ the bundle price and was given to my 9 year old daughter as a gift.For a 9 year old, it meets her expectations, but I would not other wise buy it for myself as an adult.

Reviews.Title: Very nice tablet, bad power cable
Reviews.Author: Mike Kreckel
Reviews.Content: Got it this morning. Opened it, everything worked right off of the bat. Except...for the power cord...Pros:-Many ports for many different cables-Nice screen resolution-Wide variety of apps (Google Play Store)-Android Jelly Bean 4.2-Fast and Responsive-Great for gamingCons:-Charging cable is VERY short-Not made out of the best materials-Can't charge by USB - Only by the AC/DC Power Adaptor-The power cord broke :'( But thanks to the customer support (THEY REPLIED IN 5 MINUTES!) They said they're sending me a replacement one.All in all, this is a great tablet. For the short time I had with it, I had a blast exploring the Android Jellybean 4.2 OS and customizing it to my liking, in most ways I cannot do on my apple device. I took one star off because of the charger incident. It comes with:-The tablet-A very nice Keyboard/case-A pretty decent, cheap pair of earbuds-A power cable-A USB-to-micro USB cable-A USB Female-to-USB Male cable (To plug in a USB stick for extra memory)-and a ManualI highly recommend this product, I just feel like I got an unlucky one. ;) Please, purchase this if you are interested in a high quality, low priced tablet.EDIT:After I found a charger I could use temporarily until the new one came in the mail, this tablet has been acting strange. Now, the screen won't even show. I'm not overcharging the battery because this power cord has a lower output voltage than the one it came with. I'm taking away two stars for this. If I get it to work again, I'll bring my rating back to 4 stars, but for now, it's going to 2 stars.EDIT EDIT::Alright, I figured out the issue and I fixed it. Brought my rating back to 4 stars. Sorry for the misunderstanding. Great product, it was all my mistake.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Muzzy "Rockin Mama"
Reviews.Content: So far so good. Works very well for my needs. Battery life is terrible, maybe 1 hour with constant use, but I usually just use it at home anyway to check FB and play Words with Friends. Anything more elaborate, I use my laptop. There are different types of this same brand so be careful when you order. This has a dual lens camera and flash and 3G capability. Not all of them do and it took me a while to find this one. If you really want a keyboard, (that works), and don't want to spend alot this is the way to go.

Reviews.Title: Be careful. Frustration ahead.
Reviews.Author: rheadianand
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed this tablet for about 4 hours.. Then I came back to my dorm from the library and now for whatever reason the tablet won't connect at all to my wi-fi. I've tried restarting it, putting it back to factory settings, disabling anf forgetting th ewi-fi and bringing it back.. Nothing gives.

Reviews.Title: Impressive for price
Reviews.Author: BrokeDad
Reviews.Content: A very nice inexpensive tablet.  It has not only a standard USB port for the keyboard case etc but also a micro one for transferring data, files, apps, eBooks, etc.The touch sensitivity is excellent.  There are some things that take a bit to understand/figure out as it is a Chinese tablet and the manual is mostly useless.The back camera is nice as it also has a LED flash that can also be used as a light like on an iPad if you get the appropriate app to turn it on.The quad core graphics processor is impressive and can output in 1080p via HDMI to your TV. (If you really want to use it for such)If you get this remember to get a micro SD card for more storage as I forgot.  We went out today and got a 32GB one and it works just fine.  Most of the 4GB internal is taken up with the android OS and apps so it comes with only about 830MB free internally.For the price it is an excellent buy.  Most of us spend more on a couple of pizza/delivery orders.

Reviews.Title: Love it very happy
Reviews.Author: dustin weigal
Reviews.Content: Got it for my daughter haven't had any issues or problems. The case is sturdy and the keyboard works well. Great for the price

Reviews.Title: Returned
Reviews.Author: thenursemommy
Reviews.Content: We bought this inexpensive tablet for our 6 year old son. The sound went out within a few days of use. We also encountered other problems such as extremely slow download speeds, the tablet rapidly losing battery power and the tablet resetting itself. My son even lost all of his apps on two occasions. Big disappointment! We returned it and will pay the money for a bigger name tablet.

Reviews.Title: yuck
Reviews.Author: Raynee Kremer
Reviews.Content: This thing flat out does not work and it's really a lot smaller than I originally was told, many things don't work, it was really a surprise because I was under the assumption this tablet was going to work really well.

Reviews.Title: You won't find better at this price!
Reviews.Author: Deja Hanson "Ravuun"
Reviews.Content: This was purchased for a tech-savvy man, and he has enjoyed using it immensely! The keyboard is quite easy to use and the case stands up fairly well to turn the tablet into a mini-laptop.

Reviews.Title: This Product Does Not Work!!!!!
Reviews.Author: AAllen
Reviews.Content: The charger does not work. I left it on charge for one entire day and the charger never increased the charge.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Good
Reviews.Author: Diana
Reviews.Content: I've had this little tablet for over a month now and I have no problems with it, it just a plain tablet that you can do minor things on. One thing though is that I find I must constantly charge it and the cord is to short for you to use it while leaving plugged in, unless you have plugs in a convenient place. The Keyboard case is really nice and fits it perfectly. So far so good would recommend it to anyone who wants it to watch videos or check face book and minor things like that, just don't load to many apps on it, it does slow down a bit after awhile.

Reviews.Title: Needs a lot of work...
Reviews.Author: Roland Martinez
Reviews.Content: The picture quality was poor, and grainy, and the flash was not nearly as bright as it should be. It seems to be more of an LED lamp than what is needed as a flash. The volume is weak too. It also slowed down a lot when I added a 32 GB card to it with only 150 songs on it. I was very disapointed in how much it had to buffer while watching netflix as well. The main reason I bought it was for my Radio show. I have to use my phone instead of the tablet and hope no one calls during my time on the air.The good part is, the keyboard works well, and navigation was pretty easy.I'm not one to usually write bad comments, and I can tell that the creators of this product tried hard, but I say keep trying... you'll get it.

Reviews.Title: not satisfied
Reviews.Author: Michelle A.
Reviews.Content: This tablet is very slow and fairly unresponsive. Hardly ever loads any pictures....forever just "loading" , you get  what you pay for I suppose. Not impressed and very rarely use it. Waste of money

Reviews.Title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY LIKE I DID!
Reviews.Author: Adrienna
Reviews.Content: Bought at end of November for xmas present. Was just informed by person who received the tablet as a gift, that the first time they attempted to charge it, the unusual charger broke. They are able to charge it by USB, but it takes two days.to fully charge. And the the battery wears out in less than an hour. They searched for a replacement charger, but were unable to find one, and have asked me to return it, since I purchase it. However, it has been over 30 days so I will have to purchase them a new one (definitely something better than this piece of ish) and I will be stuck with a $70 paperweight.NEGATIVE ONE MILLION STARS.

Reviews.Title: Tablet not worth the effort. Go to walmart instead
Reviews.Author: Raechel
Reviews.Content: I chose to rate this tablet as a 1 star because the 2nd day of use, the charger broke, literally the pin inside came off out of the charger itself and had to sit a certain way to charge. I was devastated as this was bought to be used for a new position where you had to have a tablet or smart phone. I bought it for my fiancee and I feel like I let him down.Raechel

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: James R. Worzala "The Word"
Reviews.Content: Don't waste your money on this cheap import. Save up and buy a good unit that works like it should

Reviews.Title: Tagital tablet
Reviews.Author: Kelli Mestdagh
Reviews.Content: This was a present for my son.  At first it was ok but now the buttons are hard to press because they "dropped" inside the tablet and the battery life is horrible!  He has to charge it every half hour or just leave it on the charger to use it!!!

Reviews.Title: not to good
Reviews.Author: Angel cortez
Reviews.Content: Not so great. Color is off. Very slow and lags and freezes alot.could have been a lot better.was not happy.

Reviews.Title: I WAS SO UPSET ABOUT MY TABLET
Reviews.Author: JoAnn Moore
Reviews.Content: I WASN'T AT HOME AND SOMEONE MUST HAVE STOLEN IT AFTER IT. I'LL ORDER ANOTHER ONE, ONE DAY JUST DON;T KNOW WHEN.

ProductInfo.Features:
Offers the power of a dual core A20 1.2GHz chip; Android 4.2.2 operating system
Mali-400 quad core graphic processor; Supports 1080P video playback, HDMI output and connection with HDTV
Supports automatic screenshot and smart G-sensor functions; Can adjust screen between 4:3 and 16:9, 2D and 3D
Conveniently surfs the internet with Wi-Fi or external 3G
Equipped with a USB port to connect with mouse/keyboard/U-disk/3G card
ProductInfo.Name: Tagital® 7 Inch Dual Core Tablet PC Android 4.2 Allwinner A20 1.2Ghz Dual Camera Bundle Keyboard
